resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!  It's a pleasure to help great folks like yourself book and enjoy a visit to our beautiful beaches.  Be sure to call Bender Vacation Rentals when you're ready for your next Gulf Coast getaway!

name: Nancy Hicks
text: We are having a wonderful vacation rental experience.  The people we've dealt with couldn't be nicer or more helpful.  Everything has been extremely organized and well thought out.  We'll hate to leave!

name: Constance Fitzsimmons
text:
I have stayed here a few times in the past and really loved my visits. This time was a different experience.
When booking I asked specifically if the unit was the one directly on the beach. I asked very specifically and was told that yes, it was the unit directly on the beach.
Imagine my surprise when I found that I was instead directly on the ROAD and farthest from the beach.
I was further disappointed in the cleanliness and in the supplies in the unit. What a sad decline. What a disappointment for my vacation.

resp.text: Constance, while Sandpiper 1A is a very nice condo, I can imagine your disappointment at the discovery that your condo was on the beach, but not beachfront. The view is different, as are the rates. There must have been a mix-up on your choice of condo.  We constantly strive to exceed in all areas, including housekeeping. If ever you have checked in a condo where cleanliness does not meet your standards, please let us know. We will correct any housekeeping issues brought to our attention.

name: Steve Fair
text: I have vacationed and owned property on the Alabama Gulf Coast for many years and can say that the employees of Bender Realty are the greatest to do business with!  Experienced and friendly, whether you are an owner or a renter, they always put the customer first and strive to give you the best experience possible.

name: Kiel Hughes
text: Masters of the bait and switch. We come here every year for the Hangout Music Fest, and we've rented from them 3 years in a row. In 2012, we paid for a 2 bedroom condo under a mile from the festival. We were then  moved to a studio over a mile and a half away when the 2 bed SUPPOSEDLY went into foreclosure. They offered us $200 off our rental to appease us. This year, we had a friend traveling down a day late to the festival. We communicated with the booking agent (Lisa?) about getting parking for our friend, and were told she would be able to park. When we arrived, this was completely untrue. It went from being first come first serve, to needing a prearranged parking pass. We were then advised to pay to park our friends car at the sons house of one of the front desk people. No thanks. We will be taking our money to one of the more professional, reputable companies next year. We are done with your shady business practices and blatant lies.

resp.text:
I was unable to locate any reservations in your name.  However, the studio you mentioned left this review on our website after their stay:

"I have to say, I was pleasantly surprised with this condo. We had originally booked a different condo that was closer to the Hangout Festival. There was a problem with the owners of that condo, and we were moved to this one. I was a bit upset because we were staying with another couple, and we were now sharing a studio apartment. There was ZERO privacy. It would be a great condo for just one couple or a small family, though. I also have to say that Bender was very sweet about it, and refunded me some of my money for the inconvenience.  I was also scared when I saw the pictures of the place. The pictures DEFINITELY need to be updated. It looks much better in person. It is very very clean, but it needs to be updated. There is no dishwasher, which was a bit of a pain. Also all of the dishes were ceramic and glass, which were not allowed at the pool or anything- I'd recommend bringing some plastic cups and paper plates. The location was AMAZING. Right on the beach. I really enjoyed the patio in the mornings. The pool was lovely, and the beach was perfection. If you are renting this place for Hangout Fest, know that this is quite the walk! We were told it was a mile away but it was actually  1.4 miles, which means that its about a 3 mile walk every day. So be prepared! Overall our stay was much better than expected, but the condo could use some updating and it was a little further than I had hoped for.  Brittany"

The condo was sold and was no longer in our rental inventory over two months ahead of your scheduled arrival date.  Since this occurred several weeks prior to your arrival, we were able to find you accommodations to fit your needs based on the information provided by you.  Thank you for staying with Bender Realty!

name: Sheila Hayes
text: Love using Bender. We have always had great service. So helpful everytime.

name: Dalton Roberson
text: My whole family loves this place! We go there every summer!

text: Love Darby Law Firm and its staff.  If you're looking for an attorney that will get the job completed timely, call them.  I am able to get my evictions served the same day as they are filed.  The process is quick from filing, serving and set out. Thank you Mr. Darby and staff.

text:
I have used Dietrich Rentals to manage my property over the past eight years.  Carolyn and her team are all very professional and have the process down for finding quality long-term tenants. D.R.

text: They will break things in the home and charge your deposit! Don’t rent from them. They use their family members repair companies for the work and stick it in their pockets as a nice little bonus. Terrible response time, they don’t respond to tenants and they’re so rude and nasty!

resp.text: We do not show a record of a Camille Burnstone listed as a prior tenant. Can you please tell me what property you are referring to?

name: James Pauly
text: Carolyn and her team took exception care of us for six years.  It started when we had to move overseas for my job, and couldn't sell our house.  From overseas, I interviewed several property management companies before deciding on Dietrich.  They found great, responsible tenants, were incredibly responsive for all maintenance or problems, and went the extra mile several times while we were abroad.  Once we moved back to the states, Carolyn guided us through every aspect of the sale of the property.  She and her team set the standard for property management, and have instilled an expectation for me going forward with any other rental properties.  Highly recommend!!!!

name: Matthew Faulkner
text:
Carolyn is awesome.  She was the agent on a rental property I owned for several years and she did a great job with that.  Her team was always responsive, they were good about taking care of repairs, and my payments were always received on time.

Also, I recently sold the rental property and I used Carolyn as the agent. She did a great job on that as well.  She went above and beyond and took care of any repairs or maintenance that needed to be done while the house was vacant.  She also staged the house, which was very helpful.  I didn't live in the same state as the house, so It would of been very difficult for me to sell the house without someone like her helping.

I would highly recommend her as both a rental agent and a selling agent.

name: Robin Ladner
text: I do not recommend this company at all. Very disappointed from beginning to end.

name: Vic Per
text:
Where do I begin?

I first met Carolyn Dietrich in 2015.  I was trying to rent my home while going through several major life events.  Needless to say, I was very overwhelmed.  A friend highly recommended her to me.  I had contacted a few property management companies prior to my first conversation with Carolyn.  To the outsider, another person’s home is just a dwelling without an emotional connection. To me, my home was a blessing from God and a source of pride at being able to independently acquire it as a single woman.  During the telephone interview, I asked her what made her so special or set her apart from the other companies.  Among other things, she told me that as a small business, she was able to provide red carpet service.  I was sold! Over the years, she did NOT disappoint me.  She ensured my home had renters who cared for it and actually enjoyed residing there.  She professionally resolved the few disagreements between the renters and me.  She and her team ensured my home was SPOTLESS when the first renter vacated.  Due to her team’s diligence and tenacity, new tenants were qualified and in place in about 15 days.   On the afternoon of 31 October 2017, Carolyn informed me that the tenants would like to not only purchase my home but also close before Christmas!  I was elated and skeptical at the same time because I knew they were first time home buyers.  I prayed about the situation.  God answered my prayer.  Carolyn agreed to represent both parties and went above and beyond to create a win-win situation for both parties.  We closed on 20 December 2017! That is a BIG deal for first time home buyers to get qualified, obtain a down payment, have inspection issues resolved, and have all paperwork correct to close in 50 days during a holiday period!  Carolyn Dietrich has been and continues to be a blessing and great source of information in recommending companies to perform work in my current home. Carolyn, THANK YOU for all you have done for me! I whole-heartedly appreciate you!  Without a doubt, Carolyn Dietrich, Dietrich & Associates Real Estate, and Dietrich Rentals sincerely provide RED CARPET service.

name: ABC Cleaning and Restoration
text: Our experience with Carolyn was fantastic! With 3 kids and one on the way, needing to stay in the same school district, and several other specifics, Carolyn was great at finding houses that met all of our needs. She was very patient with my extremely sick, pregnant wife, and when we found "THE" house, she did everything in her power to help us get this house.

name: Lindsey Horstick
text: The best rental company I have ever rented from. Carolyn was always available if I had any questions about the house, even if it was 8:00 at night. The receptionist, Shy, was also attentive and always very welcoming when I came to the office. I would easily recommend this company to anyone. If you are a tenant looking for a rental or an owner looking for a company to manage their rental property, Dietrich Rentals is the best around!

name: T. Smart
text: Carolyn and her staff are true property management professionals. They responded to tenant issues immediately and provided all rental documentation accurately and on time.  Absolutely glitch free!

name: Josh Henry
text: Working with Carolyn Dietrich or David Dill is always a pleasure. They really take great care of their properties. In this day and age its very hard to find someone who truly cares and Dietrich Rentals is one who does. I highly recommend them.

name: Tom Harrington
text:
My wife and I moved to the Huntsville/Madison County area on extremely short notice right after the Christmas holiday season.  We had a very short timeframe to find a rental house, and luckily the home we found ended up being one that was managed by Carolyn Dietrich/Dietrich Rentals.  We stayed in this house for 18 months until we were ready to purchase our own house, and during that time the service from Dietrich rentals was nothing short of excellent.

Any time we reported a maintenance issue, we had a phone call within the hour from either Dietrich Rentals or a service company asking when they could come fix the issue.  This includes an air conditioning unit that decided to stop working at 10 pm on a Saturday night in the middle of the Alabama Summer.  Quick response is an understatement.

In our experience, sometimes even the best property management companies really show their true colors when it comes time to leave a rental.  Thankfully, Dietrich Rentals was nothing like this when we moved out.  They were completely transparent about property condition throughout our stay at the rental house and recouping our deposit after we moved out was extremely easy.  This alone puts Dietrich Rentals above any property management company that I have ever personally dealt with.

I would absolutely recommend Dietrich Rentals/Carolyn Dietrich to anyone in the Huntsville area.

name: keith carpenter
text: Dietrich rentals is a first class professional rental company. The agents are some of the best in the business from returning phone calls to offering other home options to closing on the property. I have enjoyed doing business with them.

name: Christy A.
text: We rented a home from Dietrich Rentals for a year and had no problems. Ms. Carolyn was very helpful, kind and was able to answer all of our questions. I would recommend her company to anyone. ^_^

name: Todd Needle
text: Great reality company

name: John White
text: We have used Dietrich Rentals for a year now to manage our investment properties.  Carolyn and her staff have helped us grow our portfolio to six homes.  They have always been attentive, courteous, professional, and offer great advice.  We recommend her every chance we get!

name: Melissa L.
text:
Dietrich Rentals is the most unprofessional real estate company I've ever dealt with. My husband and I and my father have excellent rental history with references to prove it so we are not just some disgruntled clients. We have never had problems like we have had here with Dietrich. Her partner, Lisa, is a liar and makes promises she can't keep and does so without permission from the owner. She tells her associated one thing when relaying a message but then does another. For example, we were told we would not have to have the carpets cleaned when we left. Yet they charged us for carpet cleaning. They told us we had to clean the house before we left. I did. On hands and knees and with help. Yet they charged us $450 for a cleaning lady.
We viewed the house we rented as others were moving out. It was in serious disrepair and it was filthy. She assured us that all would be taken care of. It wasn't. The yard was a mud hole and they refused to fix it. I made a seriously detailed walk-through sheet listing every little nail hole. Turns out they lost it and had the audacity to insist that we, of course, never turned one in. We were charged for things because of their idiocy.. I have never been more displeased with someone in my life. Not only that but they didn't even have the decency to let us see what "damage" they claimed we had done. We've yet to see pictures or proof of anything and they already have people living in there now. I wouldn't wish them on anyone.

name: Lucious Blue42
text: Currently renting and the staff is professional and wonderful. Response to maintenance needs urgently and with qualified candidates/companies.

name: Stan Reese
text: First time renting from them. So far so good!

name: Bryan T DEY
text: Poor service across the board. Lied about sending paperwork out.

I called and emailed her about everything and she never complained once.  The entire process was super easy. If you are military, she will get you the BEST deal.

text: If I could put a zero I would.  I dont know about the other Realtors here but I do know about Pamela Ryan.  Beware she has no loyalty.  Bring a client and never get paid.  She is so nice at first and then will go behind your back at no cost to get the deal closed and NOT EVEN HER CLIENT.  Sad how cut throat some REALTORS TRULY are in this line of business

If we can be of direct service to you we would welcome the opportunity to personally assist you.

name: Erin Bond
text: AC in the house didn't work for a week during the hottest week of summer, called three times and no one came out to fix it. So hot my pet shrimp boiled alive. No insulation in the room that was marketed as a bedroom, absolutely miserable during the day in summer and in nights during winter. Frequently didn't respond to maintenance calls, refused to replace items that were broken, and refused to return more than a third of the safety deposit due to "paint touch-ups" with no explanation or evidence of what needed painting. One of the worst renting experiences I've had in a home that is genuinely not safe for people to live in. Bad.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Erin.  In looking through your account, the HVAC system did need extensive repairs back in August 2019.  We actually had to replace not only the entire HVAC unit, but also all of the ductwork under the house, which is why the repair took longer than expected.  The timing was certainly unfortunate in the middle of August and we did not know of your shrimp's death, so we do apologize for that loss.  In regards to the $175 moveout charge, if you would like to email or call us to discuss this in a more private setting, we would be glad to provide more documentation for the charge.  The house at 32 Holly Street is definitely an older home and with that age comes charm but also lots of maintenance (such as replacing HVAC ducts in a 2-3ft tall crawlspace).

name: cristie tidwell
text: Does anyone have an email for crimson prop.? If by chance crimson property affiliate sees this, please leave me a email for contact purposes. Its related to a property and judging by the post of multiple customers the front desk lady is more than unpleasant so id prefer  to not even have to deal with any drama or bad attitude. Please if you can leave me an email. Thank you

name: Parnell Johnson
text: House was nice.  Rent prices weren't outrageous like some other companies.  Office responded to maintenance quickly.

name: Harold Tuck
text: The office lady is the most unpleasant human being i have met. We tried applying for a property and the whole time had to deal with her being a miserable human being. We then did not get the property and the way it was told to us was very unprofessional and rude too and then when trying to get our fee back, which was told we could have back if we didn’t get the property, we were met with the office lady flipping everything and saying we won’t receive it back after she specifically said we would. DO NOT DEAL WITH THEM I CAN ONLY IMAGINE HOW BAD THEY ARE TO RENT FROM.

name: Shay
text: Crimson Properties office lady is very unpleasant and rude. Very very poor customer service. I called and spoke very pleasant to this lady and in return she was very ugly. Will not, I mean not recommend them nor do any business with them at all only because of a 50 second conversation with her.

name: Maycie Boyd
text: I enjoyed my house I leased from Crimson Properties.  I can see how the office lady's professional tone might come across as rude, but she was always helpful when I called.  I would rent from them again.

name: Alicia Shurbet
text:
We've lived here at 1 circlewood for a year. So far, these things have happened.
1. Roof in the kitchen completely collapsed. We had called many times over a span of 2-3 months to tell them the cracks in the ceiling were growing, but no response. Supposedly the maintenance guy (the only maintenance guy) came to check it out, but did nothing. Luckily the day it happened, I knew it was going to happen before the day was over so we moved everything out of the way, and sure enough a few minutes later it fell. We were choking on insulation for the next couple of hours. Luckily no one was standing underneath when it happened....we called the emergency line all night with no answer and ended up covering the ceiling ourselves with plastic. Took 3 weeks for them to come fix it completely.
2. The front door is hanging from one hinge.
3. I just moved the shower head and it broke off.
4. The one window that isn't double paned has a lock that doesn't keep the window from opening, so we put a curtain rod in it to keep anyone from getting in.
5. The window panes are falling off.
6. Mold behind the toilet
7. If you have water running somewhere else, you lose almost all water pressure in another room.
8. Power bill in the winter never went below $350. It's an old house, sure, but that seemed unheard of. One room would be blazing hot while another would be freezing.

The house is cute, the people working there are nice, and location is great, but I will never rent from them again. It's hard to find a place to rent in tuscaloosa that isn't 800-1200 dollars a month and rent by room, so we thought this one was a steal, but we had to find out why it was so cheap the hard way.

resp.text: We are sorry you had those issues at your home, Alicia.  We do appreciate your continued business and we hope that your 3 lease renewals is indicative of an improved happiness with your house and our company.

name: Shaniece Morris
text: The lady in the office answering the phones is SUPER rude. She acts like she doesn't want to be there. If you don't like your job stay at home.! She acts like it's an issue to do her job and answer questions about properties or transfer me to somebody who can.

name: Shawn Williams
text: Unprofessional, A joke !

name: Shikera B.
text:
Well, I made the mistake of NOT visiting the property first! I have zero problems with paying, but I expect a certain level of service for my funds. It was a SIGN when the pro-rated amount was incorrectly calculated. Still, I waited for it to be corrected. Due to work, I was not able to view the apartment right away. After doing so, I completed the move-in, and sent it back. On the day I signed the lease I was informed the carpet has to be professionally cleaned. CLEARLY taking the time to paint the place is ASKING FOR TOO MUCH. I recall Ann being very precise about the carpet; so, when I completed my move-in and saw how the walls had scuffs everywhere I was truly upset! Ann's explanation was the walls are not... are not always paint... you know when... well, I'll just look at your move-in. I've lived in large cities and countryside and never have I lived in a ROACH infested home in either area!

Also, I allowed time to see if someone would return and paint, but almost a month in and no one has shown up. I guess I'll have to paint the walls myself!

I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND ANYONE to REALITY or ST. CLAIR HOMETOWN RENTALS.

I have a year here... so, things can change. So can this review see y'all in July!

Also, I did not feel discriminated against... as, I have read other mention discrimination. I felt my concerns were unimportant after the contract was signed and I'd paid what was due.

name: Superior Tech
text:
This has to be the worst Real Estate company that my wife and I know. We are not renters. We have no affiliation with this company whatsoever. We were trying to move from Atlanta to Alabama (Ragland), and we found a home listed by this agency (St. Clair). After many attempts to contact this agency and Agent (Thomas), we received no calls or e-mails from them. Please save your time and energy and find another Agency and Agent. This company is not interested in selling you property. We believe that this company needs to be evaluated or reevaluated by the Better Business Bureau  so that consumers can know more about their business practices--or lack thereof.
Thank you for reading this post. We hope that is helps you stay clear of St. Clair HomeTown Properties, at least until they change the way they operate their business.

resp.text: I did respond to your gmail email account and let you know that the house you inquired about was under contract. I did not get a response.

name: Fred Couch
text:
Frankly, I would be embarrassed if anyone ever felt the need to leave this kind of feedback to warn others from using my service. And mind you I dealt with both the rental manager (Ann) and the owner (Sharon).

To preference everything, I paid my rent if not on time, weeks in advance, and kept the place in better condition than when we found it.

The short version - I would never rent, buy, or do any business with this company again.

I would get radio silence from both Ann (rental manager) and Sharon (the owner of the company) for weeks, if not months at a time regarding anything.

Work orders open for over 8 months at a time, and then when you are tired of paying your rent on time and not taking no for an answer, they have the audacity to tell you that you are harassing them. That is a legitimate statement I got back after paying rent for 12 months on time, and finally not taking radio silence for an answer and calling every 30 minutes to get an answer that I deserve. And Sharon (the owner of the company) told me I was harassing her after a phone call a day for a week with no answer, and finally demanding someone at her company did their job (which apparently is a huge inconvenience for them) she finally texted me saying I was harassing her.

Then they blame the owner after its all said and done and try to pass the buck. I don't care if the owner of the property is a use to be pastor that coaches football. It is your job to manage the client, not mine.

Don’t get me wrong, they tell you up front that this sort of thing would never happen there (because we said in advance it was a problem before). They still just took the money and did not care to handle anything in a timely matter, or at all.

!!!!!!READ THAT AGAIN!!!!!

Just look elsewhere.

name: Kathy Seeders
text:
Sharon Thomas and St Clair Hometown Properties professionally managed my property for several years and I’ve never had a vacancy.  I travel frequently, so communication is a top priority for me.  I couldn’t be there to look after the property myself, but Sharon and her team at Hometown properties ensured maintenance needs and tenant concerns were addressed quickly and professionally.  I could rely on them to arrange qualified and experienced maintenance personnel for things like AC and plumbing repairs, and they always kept me in the loop.  You will not find a more reliable property management group than Sharon Thomas and the team at St Clair Hometown Properties.

The sale of my property was also handled by Sharon Thomas.  She ensured so many actions were taken care of, including things the owner would typically handle.   Her advice was spot-on regarding preparing the property for sale. She was open to discussing repairs and she also stepped in to ensure the property clean and ready for showing.  Hometown Properties did a great job listing my home for sale and I had numerous showings in a very short time, resulting in a quick contract for sale/purchase.  Sharon was right there to help advise me on the negotiation for this sale.

name: Leigh Cornelius Rice
text: My husband and I have had a very positive experience with HomeTown Properties from the very start. Ann Ross showed us three properties which met our criteria, answered all of our questions and has become a valuable resource since we are new to the area. She was patient and responsive as we worked through some minor repairs after move-in. I highly recommend this rental company.

name: Matt Smith
text: We have been renting for the past year  with St. Clair HomeTown Properties. We moved back to Pell City from out-of-state and needed to rent while we are building a house. We started with a 9 month lease and quickly realized that our house would not be finished in time, we contacted our agent Ann, we were able to move to a 12 month lease with no problems. We had a few AC problems when we first moved in, it stopped working on a Sunday afternoon in August, they had someone out within 2 hours to get it up and going. It stopped again a few weeks later late in the evening, again someone was out quickly to patch it for the night and back to repair the problem the next day.  We also had a kitchen light that was blowing through bulbs, they contacted the owner and he came out and replaced it. It has been an overall great experience and I would highly recommend St. Clair HomeTown Properties.

name: Tracy Sargent
text: Hometown Properties have managed our rental properties for years.  They have secured quality renters while helping us to maintain our property.  I highly recommend them!

name: Cody Fowler
text: I work as a vendor for these guys on occasion and they are great people to work with. Ann stays in great communication and is always adamant about prioritizing her homeowner’s and tenant’s concerns.

name: Christen McKinney
text: Been a tenant since 2018 in one of the rental properties they manage. The application and approval process was very easy and efficient. Mrs Marcie Russell is very professional and so nice and cooperative. The only issues have been minor maintenance that just simply comes with any home. Always a quick response to get the job done. Office is in Alabaster which is quite a drive from where I live, but it's only been a few times I've had to drive out. Thanks again!

name: One Sexy Gemini (one sexy gemini)
text: If you're looking to rent or even have your property managed.... please look somewhere else!  And this is coming from a tenant that called about a water leak that is so bad I had to disconnect the water myself from the outside meter ,and that’s  because the only plumbing company they use can't  schedule me in for another 2 days, and the only maintenance man they have couldn't stop what he was doing to come look at the problem  either .... and when asked what are my kids and myself are supposed to do about using the restroom, cooking, and even taking a bath.... I was told " you do understand we have other tenants that have things going on" instead of calling another company to come fix the problem....I'll be calling off again shorting my check so I can be home when the plumber comes , but hey! Who needs a whole paycheck especially when you’re a single mom with 2 kids, rent, 2 car notes, utilities, and a host of other bills...... I guess I just have to understand my emergency isn't really an emergency to everybody

name: Tonya Williams Life Coach
text: Excellent services and very professional! Always responds to our needs fast, always suggests what’s in our best interest. We have used them for both rental properties and selling a house and we have always had an excellent experience!!! I would highly recommend her services and plan to do more business in the future!

name: Wayne Jones
text:
Marcia is excellent in the areas of communication and follow up. She is very easy to work with and cares about he clients. Our company renovates houses throughout central Alabama, I hope our paths cross again. It was a pleasure working with her.

Wayne
Birmingham Homebuyers LLC

name: Luh Kayla TV
text: The Russell realty is a very unprofessional and inconsiderate renting company. In My opinion they are money hungry and all they care about is the rent payment. We have been without a oven for a month going on two and when we do get in touch with the lady she is very rude and just repeat the same thing.... everything is a courtesy and I wouldn’t recommend them to rent from. You better off buy a house than to deal with them and they do it yourself contract. They don’t help with anything and I mean ANYTHING!!!!They don’t communicate with you at all. Oh but when the rent is late they send letters and they call. That is the ONLY!!! time you hear from them .

resp.text: Unfortunately, we do not repair or replace appliances according to the lease agreement. Out of courtesy, Russell Realty purchased a new stove for the unit. Due to COVID-19, many manufacturers are behind which is out of the company’s control. We strive to maintain excellent customer service at Russell Realty & Associates. If you would like to address your concerns further please contact our office during regular business hours at (205) 358-3377.

name: Brittny Nicole
text: They are good people.

name: Lauri Schroeder
text: I was just curious about a house in my community. Website showed a picture but no other information unless you gave your phone number. I think if you're going to have properties for sale, all information on that property should be right there on the website. Just saying,..

name: Nairobi Lynn
text: Russell Realty gave me excellent service! I would definitely recommend them for any real esate services. Great staff!!

name: Family Guy
text: If I could give zero stars i would. Russell Realty was one of the most unprofessional group of people i have ever had to deal with. I would not recommend them for sales or rentals. Take your business elsewhere unless you want to work with people who are liars when they refuse to take accountability for something. Or maybe you like contracts to be violated....then this is your place.

resp.text: Family Guy, we strive to maintain excellent customer service at Russell Realty & Associates and we would like the opportunity to address your concerns.  Please contact our office during regular business hours at (205) 358-3377 so we can get a few more details regarding your experience.

name: Jasmine Williams
text: Russel realty is very unprofessional..they didnt respond to any request to veiw the property..I would defininitly give a -0.. When we did reach them.The realtor told us she would give us a call 30 min prior to us meeting..she NEVER DID.i called her to confirm she was still coming after we even stayed in alabaster an hour and half just to meet with her..she told us she was only 5 min away and she was coming.SHE NEVER DID..me and my husband decided to find the office to get in touch with her which was pretty close..she then proceeded lie to our faces and said that she did come to the property..i have never experienced anything like this..the woman never apologized and didnt seem to be bothered by her unprofessionalism..please dont do this to yourself

name: Michael Willliams
text: Great Service! Excellent Experience Thanks Marcia!

name: Mickael Glass
text: IF I COULD GIVE ZERO STARS I WOULD! THEY WILL GET YOUR HOPES AND DREAMS UP ABOUT YOUR NEW HOME AND TAKE IT RIGHT AWAY FROM YOU JUST BECAUSE THEY FELT LIKE IT. MY FRIEND HAD SIGNED HER LEASE AND WAS POSE TO GET HER KEYS FRIDAY AND MARCIA REFUSED TO GIVE HER THE KEY WITHOUT ALABAM POWER CONFIRMATION NUMBER SHE PRESENTED HER WITH EVERYTHING THAT THEY REQUESTED AND THEY STILL TREATED HER RUDELY, AND I DONT THINK THAT WAS FAIR TO HAVE THIS LADY SIGN HER LEASE GET READY TO MOVE AND THEN DENY HER OF HER HOME. THE HOME WASNT EVEN READY BUT MY FRIEND WAS STILL WILLING TO WORK WITH THEM. THE HOUSE HAD MOLD FROM THE LIVING ROOM TO THE BEDROOM, SHOWER WAS NOT EVEN IN CONDITION TO USE!!!! RUSSELL Realty IS ONE COMPANY I WOULDNT DARE RENT FROM ! I WOULDNT EVEN GIVE THEM ONE STAR!

name: Danielle E
text: Friendly staff and everyone was easy to work with. Would definitely recommend!

name: Sislak Sisters
text: Great staff!

name: Jada Jones
text: Love!

name: Jarrod Hall
text: Professional reality

name: David Norris
text: Very professional staff, top notch company to have handling HOA business. Highly recommend!

name: P Mccormick
text:
Marci the property manager is absolutely horrible. I had rodents in my apartment at Red Top and it took them months to send out maintenance to the property. Then when I moved they took $200 from my deposit for things like leaving the shower hooks and the shower rod in the bathroom, having dust on the ceiling fan, dust on the air vent in the living room, and leaving a spray bottle on the counter in the bathroom. I found it ridiculous because I don’t know anyone who would clean the dust off the ceiling fan before they leave an apartment. Blackwell is the worst I’ve ever experienced. Very, very, very unprofessional and unorganized. They do not care about their tenants and they will simply ignore you for days and months at a time and then just take money from you just because they can.
I don’t see how they are still in business.... the entire office needs to be replaced with urgency.

resp.text:
Ms. Mccormick, we are sorry for the inconvenience that you experienced while living on our property.  We paid for additional pest extermination to try to resolve the rodent problem within your unit.  They set traps multiple times, and we are disappointed that it did not help rectify your situation sooner.  Per your move-out policy, all personal items must be removed and the entire unit must be left clean to get a full refund of your deposit.   This includes the cleaning of ceiling fans, cabinets and appliances.  We are sorry we were only able to refund 3/4ths of your deposit and that we were unable to grant your request for another unit at your current rate.   We wish you the best.
Blackwell Nelson Management

name: AJ Lanier
text: Blackwell Nelson has been a good company to me anytime I call or go by the office they are very professional and handle things promptly. Melissa P is awesome she is professional,very sweet, and understanding. I was impressed on how everything was handled and how swift she got things done..I see all the nasty reviews but in my situation I have only had excellent service with them.

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate you taking time to share your experience with us.  We agree, Melissa is truly a gem to have on our team.

name: MIGUEL ANGEL YOPOLO
text:
I just rented a condo in Birmingham, named Carmel’s condominium, at the beginning we had some problems and Katrina Blackwell and her team came to our new place and fixed everything in less than 24 hours; it was a surprise how they responded  so quickly to our request. Katrina, your company is very professional. My sister Jenny I are very happy to have chosen  you, to find our new lovely home. Thanks to Katrina Blackwell and her team: Jonathan, Logan, Armando and Cesar. Thanks a lot guys you’re absolutely helpful.
Sincerely,
Miguel A. Yopolo.

resp.text: Thank you Miguel for your kind words.  We love our maintenance team and are so happy to hear your issues were addressed in a friendly and timely manner.  Best of luck in your new home.

name: Lauren E Means
text: I would usually never write reviews but after this experience I will. They never return phone calls and told me today that they would only come look at the problem of the whole building not having hot water because another unit also called. I would also like to point out that my roof has leaked for over 2 years now, I have emailed and called every time it happens and still it is not fixed. I would not recommend them to anyone because of how out of control and not caring they are.

resp.text: Lauren,  We are sorry that you have experienced an unfortunate plumbing issue.  As we shared with you, the repair timeline of "Friday" was given to us by the plumber.  However, they were able to find and overnight the needed part.  The HOA is paying the after hour fee to make the emergency repair and you should have hot water restored today.   In regards to your roof leak, we see in the maintenance log that repairs have been made to your roof.  We understand that you are still having issues and emailed you on January 14th to schedule the additional repair for this Thursday.   We have not heard back from you to confirm this appointment.  Please contact us and we will be happy to work with you to try to resolve your roofing issue.  Thank you.  Blackwell Nelson Management

name: Dan Rhodes
text: I normally don't write google reviews but after my interaction with Amy in their office, I had to brag on her. She has been working with me over the past couple of months with a violation letter regarding my trash container being left outside for too long after trash days. I was upset when I received the violation because I work very long hours taking care of patients during Covid and sometimes have to spend the night with patients and can't get home to move the container from the road. Amy was very understanding and worked with me on a solution instead of just fining me. 5 STARS to Amy at Blackwell Nelson. Good job!

resp.text:
Dan,
Thank you for your review.  By helping homeowners better understand their HOA Covenants and Restrictions we work to minimize fines while maintaining your property values.  We are happy that Amy was able to work with you to reach a solution.

name: Daniel Simpson
text: I love this team! Thank you for all you do for us.

name: Amanda Capps
text: I have lived at my property for 2 1/2 years and have had a great experience dealing with Blackwell Nelson. If I ever move to another community with an HOA I would strongly recommended them.

resp.text:
Amanda,
A word of mouth recommendation is the best compliment that we can receive. We have enjoyed working with your HOA and look forward to a continued partnership.  Blackwell Nelson

name: ashley serra
text: Great company that helps manage my property.  Responsive to my renters calls for service.  Would highly suggest using them for your rental management needs.

resp.text: Ashley, we appreciate your choosing us to manage your rental property.  We work hard to handle all of the details of property management to minimize your hassle and maximize your investment.  Thank you for recommending Blackwell Nelson.

name: Business Email
text:
Dear Prospective Clients:

It is my immense pleasure to recommend Blackwell Nelson for all your real estate needs! Katrina, Marci, Kellie, Laura and their maintenance staff are all Class Acts! After reading a few negative reviews, I felt propelled to share my experience.

Katrina and her staff are highly attentive! All my phone calls and emails were returned the same day and minor maintenance request were answered promptly. I never felt neglected or unimportant. Katrina and her team are highly personable and provides excellent customer service! I am pleased to recommend Blackwell Nelson to anyone looking to rent, buy or sell a home.

Katrina and her staff are hands down the best in the business!

Sincerely,
A highly satisfied and honest client

name: Nicole Thomas
text: For 5 YEARS We have been asking for the in pool light to be fixed. It's COMPLETELY DARK AT NIGHT.  Still to this day light doesn't work.  MANY PROBLEMS & VERY LITTLE RESULTS!! LIVED HERE 6 YEARS & STILL WORKING ON SAME PROBLEM.

resp.text:
Yeetaway Gaming,

We appreciate you voicing your concern regarding the pool lights.  Being a 40 plus year old pool, we have unfortunately had on-going issues with making repairs.   The light issue has been addressed with a certified electrician and a local pool company.  All breakers and GFIs have been replaced.  In lieu of continued repairs, we have contacted Alabama Power to install new LED lights in the area that they will repair and maintain.

Best Regards,
Blackwell Nelson Management

name: Jeff Aycock
text: This has to be the worst HOA management company in the US. They do not return calls and maintenance tickets NEVER receive a response - let alone get the work done. The BOD of the HOA needs to replace these buffoons - quickly.

resp.text:
Jeff,
Blackwell Nelson Management Company properly informed the HOA Board of your maintenance request.  They are fully aware of the issue, and have engaged their licensed contractor to make the repair on behalf of the HOA.  We understand your frustration with the wait.  The Board has informed us that it will be completed soon. Thank you!

name: Alexis Seymore
text: Katrina at Blackwell Nelson couldn't have been better to work with on the renovation and sale of my condo in Woodland Village.  I was very pleased with everything.  After the renovation was complete, it sold to the first buyer who looked at it.  Great experience!  Would recommend the company to anyone!

name: RA 46
text: Nitpicky, inconsistent management company. Avoid them as HOA "enforcement "

resp.text:
Hello RA 46,
Please feel free to email us at HOA@blackwellnelson.com if we can help resolve any issues that you might have with non-compliance.  Thank you.
Blackwell Nelson Companies

name: Tom McLaughlin
text:
I chose Katrina Blackwell of Blackwell Nelson Companies to handle the management and sale of my condo in Birmingham, Alabama.  Katrina did a great job of developing a plan to get my condo on the market.  The plan started with research to determine the value of the condo.  The next step was to send out a "coming soon" notification to start the advertising process.  We received two very qualified offers on the first day that the condo went on the market!  Amazing!

When you are hiring a real estate firm you are actually hiring a company that has the market knowledge and experience to take care of your needs.  Katrina Blackwell of Blackwell Nelson Companies has the experience and know how to get the job done.  I am proud to give Blackwell Nelson my highest unqualified recommendation.

Tom McLaughlin
Brentwood, Tennessee

name: Dede Cards
text:
If you rent or own in Birmingham, Alabama please DON'T engage in business with these people! I had to give them one star to actually post this review!

It takes them forever to repair things. Last week  (June 28, 2019)someone in my grandfather's apartment ( Red Top Apartments)was evicted and the sheriff threw their clothes and furniture all over the parking lot. We've called Katrina and Marci and informed  them of the trash and how unsanitary and how it is taking up parking spaces as well. This trash has been sitting out in the parking lot for a week now!

I've had to call the Department of Health on these people!  The trash is attracting rodents and other insects! I've also had to call them to mow the  property 's lawn as well!

Because they don't maintain their properties and they don't care about people just money!

resp.text: Hello Dede, I'm sorry you have to make such calls as I am sure the Property Manager has spoken to the same person twice who chooses to make complaints ANONYMOUSLY on others behalf. We have shared with you the rules of evictions. There have been no known issues with the evicted items that were put out. On the same day the Sheriff put out the eviction, you called to say rodents, pest and homeless were camped out which is untrue due to the surveillance in which we monitor. If your love one, the actual tenant - whom we have had great communication with all of them is not happy at Red Top, please have them call our office.

name: Michael Kittinger
text:
If I could give negative stars, this company deserves it.

I own a rental property that they manage. For over a year they sent letters to the rental company instead of my home address (which they have b/c I had this issue 3 years ago). Now they've tacked on hundreds in "late fees" to the balance.

I have called 4 times and emailed 4 times over the past 30 days and can't even get a response.

This company is even worse than Birmingham Water Works... which says A LOT.

[Update] so they took some of the fees off and I paid with 7 days of finally talking to someone at Blackwell. About 60 days later I’m start getting calls from attorney office (Cloud Willis) saying I’m delinquent and have to go through them to finalize a settlement. Nope. Sent them proof I paid within 7 days of being notified and told them if they kept calling I’d get an attorney and file suit for harassment. Then blocked their number.

This is literally one of the worst companies and setups I’ve ever dealt with. If they can’t handle renters and owners and send communications to the right party, they don’t need to be a real estate or management company.

resp.text:
Mr. Kittinger,

We appreciate you taking time to address your concerns and would like to apologize for any confusion.  When we took over management of your community, all correspondence regarding your outstanding dues, late fees, and fines went to the on-site address that had been provided.  We added your off-site address once we were contacted with the correct information.  Your account is in good standing and we are glad we could work together to resolve this matter.

Best Regards,

Blackwell Nelson Management

name: haris zafar
text: This is the worse HOA company I have seen. I am paying $248 for a supposedly HOA fee they don’t do any thing. Worse and worse and worse company. When i complain about the condition of my house from the outside they make excuses I am super annoyed with quilts of the service.I wish I had the option to give them no stars.

name: Austin Mann
text: I found their staff responsive and polite, and I needed help, and didn't have an appointment. I could tell they were swamped also. Thank you to them.

name: Miranda Joseph
text: This is the worst company for HOAs. I have called for months, left messages, and went to their office. No one calls me back or is interested in what i have to say. However, the company continues to send letters but won't follow up. Their accounting records of who has paid dues and who hasnt is horrible. They've sent letters to homeowners about bills that are 2 years old after saying the homeowners were paid in full. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY. I REPEAT, DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!! Very unprofessional and not organized at all.

name: Shaniqa Walton
text: Blackwell Nelson is by far the best management company out there.  There level of customer service is on point.  Their controller Tanya Nichols has been able to decrease our past dues by thousands.  Roxane Nelson conducted maintenance projects that increased our property value.  Their attention to detail is amazing.  Katrina Blackwell used her expertise in real estate to keep houses selling and our neighborhood vibrant.  They are far ahead in service than all the other property management companies.

name: Wally Franklin
text: Our HOA has been with Blackwell Nelson for only three months and they have done more for us than our last management company did in 5 years.  They are very knowledgeable and extremely professional.  Tanya's Nichols has cleaned up our neighborhood and it looks great.  She also has past dues to a minimum. They are by far the best management company out there.  They have delivered on every promise that they committed to.  Very professional.

name: Alice Smith
text: They manage Cambrian Woods where I own a townhouse.  They are the absolute worst!  They do not respond to calls or emails.  They do not fix things.  Even visiting them in person does not help.  I can't imagine why they are in business and I hate that I own a townhouse which is (mis) managed by this company.  Wish there was something I could do about it (other than move).

resp.text: Dear Alice, Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We value your comments and appreciate any feedback.  We handle requests on a priority, emergency,  and moderate repair schedule. This repair was classified as a moderate repair and was handled on a timely basis. We apologize if this issue was not addressed as promptly, to your satisfaction. If you have any additional issues in the future, please feel free to contact our office.

name: Larry Davis
text: As a previous member of the  Edenton Residential  Board of Directors I had the privilege  of working with Tanya, Roxanne, Ray and Katrina of the Blackwell-Nelson Co. on an almost daily bases for an extended period of time. These ladies (and Ray) were always on top of their game , conducted themselves in a professional manner and know what it take to effectively manage a large condominium association.   Whether your looking for a company to manage your residential community  or your condominiums, I would  recommend you consider using their services

name: Nanette Crocker
text: I have worked with the Blackwell Nelson property management team as a member of a Board for the last 8 years. Roxane Nelson has been our property manager supported by her team of professionals who help to make property improvements, perform maintenance, perform billing, collections and receivables processing, and to conduct owner meetings with timely notifications/newsletters. They have always been responsive and enjoyable to work with.

name: Cupcakes 701
text:
This company owns Red Top Apartments where I reside. They took ownership in November 2018 and ever since then they have not kept up this property. The lawn is over growing and the hedges have not been cut.

I would  inform anyone, DO NOT rent an apartment or property that this company owns.

Katrina Blackwell is lazy, arrogant and she is nothing short of a slumlord.

Myself and other tenants have called and emailed her about the poor conditions of the property for MONTHS and she has successfully ignored us!

resp.text: Hello Cupcake, thank you for your review. However, if you are an actual resident of Red Top, you would know the correct Property Manager which has been seen on property many  times and very accessible. We came on board in mid-December as the management company.  Since we have taken over as the management company, we have made significant progress in the improvement of the property.  We installed an 8 foot privacy fence, repaved and striped parking, updating the units, and also have implemented monthly pest control. All of these improvements have benefited the community. We are always looking for ways to  improve. If you have specific needs, please call our office with your unit information and we will be happy to assist you.

name: Jenifer Hohnbaum
text: I wish I could submit ‘0’ stars. The fact that I contacted the Board of Realtors to file a complaint and they admitted I’m among multiple people who’ve filed a complaint against this company, is evidence alone as to their unprofessionalism. This is the first review I’ve ever left on a company, simply because I want to prevent any consumer from suffering what I’ve been through. My relationship with this company began positive, but was far from that by the end. It seems they grew too fast and don’t have enough staff, cause I used to admire Katrina‘s ‘go getter’, professional demeanor. They’ve cost me thousands of dollars from their negligence to report a leak, leaving the property unkempt and vacant for 7-8 months, repeatedly sending emails, calling, and attempting to reach someone getting no responses,.... The worst part is that after costing me so much grief, time and money, they cover up their mistakes with excuses. The male owner even went so far as to verbally attack me. Is it so hard to take ownership and correct your mistakes?! Don’t pay them a dime of your money. Please do your homework, as they didn’t have any reviews when I first hired them. I wish I knew then what I know today. Wishing you the best in finding a solid company!

name: Orders Desk
text:
Professional and dedicated.

Our contact person is Roxane Nelson and she attends all of our HOA meetings. They follow and enforce all of the by-laws of our condo in a fair and impartial manner. As always they could be better in some areas but are the best of the local management companies.

name: Troy Mengel
text: Wow do I wish all these reviews were posted when I unfortunately decided to use this company as our property management.  I will tell you that I have experienced most of the negative feedback that has been posted as well.  Very difficult to work with.  Emotional and unprofessional.  Once you sign and they get their money, you are no longer a priority.  Good luck getting a timely response to anything.   As a property owner I do not feel well represented and I would encourage others to not make the same mistake we did by signing with this group...because you will be stuck.

name: Dannon Appleyard
text: Fantastic Group to work with! They care about what they are doing!

name: David Lockett
text:
The absolute worst. I am a former employee of Blackwell Nelson and these reviews are absolutely true. They are the worst Real Estate Company. They are operating without any respect for employees and tenants. And the Boss Roxanne is a Liar and Deciever. I spoke with one tenant who lives at Four Seasons and she stated she had been complaining about a branch overhanging.To make a long story short the branch fell on a resident's car Blackwell Nelson claimed it was an act of GOD. But it was negligence. If they had cut the branch it would not have fell onto the car. They are several other complaints as well. I was fired from this company. And when I asked why was I being fired Roxanne told me we should leave it at that. Katrina was there as well. I thought I had the right to know why I was being  fired. She Roxanne was very vague. I then filed for unemployment and found out the reason I was fired was because of going into a storage unit without permission. This is what the company told the unemployment office. They do investigations as to why or why not you should receive benefits .I spoke with one of the residents of the storage unit and they told me that I was fine, also there was a camera on the storage unit as well. I lost an item and was looking for it in the storage because often times we place tools and other items inside storage units. So when I found out this was the reason I was fired I grew suspicious and
was very frustrated. I'm going through the process as we speak dealing with this company And I have filed a complaint with the EEOC. These properties are poorly maintained and they  employ young people and mexicans who they get over on. They  have no respect for safety. And there are several violations at hand. I even expressed my concern to Roxanne about this.  I can recall several unsafe practices  at this job. All they do is patch work and find the cheapest way out. I was an employee there. And the only time they fix something is if it is a sever problem the employees have to stress it to them. I was working there from October of last year until June this year. I have pictures of these unsafe practices. Also I can recount several instances  as well like illegally building a fence at Red Top .I was there when the job started. They didnt even have a permit and They very well knew it too. There was another instance where we were supposed to clean gutters and their method was tying a rope around one person climb to the top while the other person is also tied on to the other side
the rope. Nothing was securing either individual. This was very dangerous and  the rooftops were very steep. But some employees went along with this process I refused.These people need to be held accountable for there actions and the tenants are right. There are several complaints. There was a guy complaining the day I got fired he was very upset. This is an cancerous organization. I may be labeled as an upset individual and that may be correct . But what I am is a fair individual and I as well as these employees and tenants were and are being treated unfairly.

Thes people are Slum Lords I expressed this to one of the employees that still works therer. He may have well been apart of my firing as well. Because the day I said this to him is the day I got fired.

Myself and the two mexicans were the only minority there. Ever one else was White. I dont want to play the race card I'm just stating facts

All people share this this

resp.text: Blackwell Nelson adheres to fair labor practices. The EEOC has completed their investigation and concluded that this termination was substantiated.

name: Patricia Jones
text: I'm with everyone else.  It should be a 0 or a minus you could post because they are evidently just scam artists. They get there and then do nothing.  What are the fees for?  Cutting the grass and paying the water bill?  Then when they have a major leak, which should be on them, their maintenance of the building, they want to stick us with a big one time charge to pay for their neglect?  Now the fee is going up again because of water leaks? I mean really, somebody is making a killing. Who runs the HOA? Isn't that the residents? Who hired this crappy company, the owners or the residents/HOA? Do they have a contract that will eventually expire? No answers from them.  Hate them. How do you get an upstairs neighbor with a leak that is ruining your condo to cooperate with fixing the leak.  Blackwell-Nelson is not  the one to call because they don't care even though they tell you they are doing all they can to remedy the situation while your condo is being ruined.  I can't wait to sell mine and get the hell out of there.  Why can't we do a class-action law suit against them.  There has got to be a lawyer somewhere.  It looks like that is the only way for me to get mine fixed. This is July, original leak, January 2018.  Oh, and we also cannot get any pool passes.  I guess we pay our fees to be blackballed.  Mine are at Four Seasons. Is anyone above this one phone number we have to get in touch with them.  Lawyers are on their way.

name: Kortney Sloan
text: Paying $248 + $125 every month. I have made 4 maintenance requests over a course of 10 months with no response. Horrible service and management.

name: Devin “Gearhog” Payne
text: I have lived at Bristol for several years and the people here are incredibly unprofessional... One person in particular has acted in an extreme manner on multiple occasions and shown their inability to handle situations with a level head. They do not communicate and will go long periods without any communication, and will send their lower tier employees to handle situations that higher management should do. I would not recommend this business to anyone, as they have shown me, as well as others, how truly unprofessional and unreliable they are.

name: Dawn Zink
text: I don’t know who would use this company! They are the worst people to work with that I have EVER encountered.  They do not return phone calls after they hire a lawyer to collect funds I already paid.  They do not even know the property I live on when I ask them questions.  If I could sell and move from this location I would just to NOT have to deal with them and their HOA.  WORST COMPANY EVER!

name: Jeffery Simmons
text: WARNING!! DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THESE PEOPLE! This is the worst customer service I have ever came across. The people in the office are the laziest, most unreliable people I have ever seen and I have experienced some pretty bad customer service before. Do yourself a favor and keep moving when you come across these guys, you’ll thank me later!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Blackwell Nelson handles request on a priority, emergency and moderate repair schedule. We understand your frustration with it taking 4 days to repair the shower head leaking. I can assure you we were not being unresponsive as there were larger plumbing issues that we handled on the property at that time. Thank you again for your patience. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if you have any further issues.

name: Terry Brown
text: I have lived in many communities and been on many boards, because of this I have interviewed multiple Property Management Companies.  Blackwell Nelson is a local company and is by far the most responsive I have ever been in business with.

name: India Booker
text: I listed with them over a year ago. In the year they did projects to my house for the tenants paid for and then told me afterwards. I was never given a option to find contractors on my own but was definitely expected to pay them for whomever they found. Communication is NOT a strong point with this company. My lease renewal was coming up and I reached out to them just to find out that my property was handed over to another agent that I never heard from. Once I got in contact after several times reaching out he told me that he would send out a notice. Two months later I still didn't hear anything from my tenants or the people who I paid to watch my property. After repeated emails that went either unanswered or one sentence response, no return phone calls I found out that the tenants moved out before the move date!! It's been a month since this happened and I continue to try to get in touch and I have no clue about anything. Last month rent, deposits, my house keys, walk thrus. I definitely WOULD NOT recommend anyone to use this company

name: DJ Wood
text: If you are considering hiring Blackwell-Nelson to manage your HOA or condominium association, I recommend that you walk away and don't look back.  In my opinion, Katrina Blackwell, Roxanne Nelson, and their loyal minion, Tanya Nichols,  should never be allowed to manage another community association.  From the perspective of a homeowner, and a Board member, I have never encountered a worse company.  As a homeowner, they were unresponsive and lacked basic customer service skills.  As a Director of the HOA Board, if they don't like the Board's decisions, they will go directly to the owners to encourage an uprising. They will meddle in your elections, (think Peter Strzok and Lisa Paige), and ignore instructions from the Board for weeks/months.  If they give you references, be wary. Contact the directors that fired them - not the directors they worked for behind the scenes to undermine the majority.

name: Dylan Duncan
text: After being a tenant for over 2 years now I have nothing but positive things to say, the agents and the new maintenance team are fantastic!

name: Amy Nichole
text: If I could, I would not even give this company one star. They are very unprofessional and there is zero communication. After calling and emailing multiple times they still have not addressed our porch safety issues which needs to be replaced, we were charged an outrageous amount of money for a fireplace assessment fee but yet no one even came to look at our fireplace,. The homeowners association fee is $300 a month which is unheard of and doesn't even offer anything for the community in return. They will not return phone calls or emails, and Roxanne basically dog cussed my fiancé which is very unprofessional. Everyone that lives in our neighborhood is trying to get out and is trying to sell their houses but no one wants to buy because no one wants to pay a $300 a month home association fee for a neighborhood that is old and the townhomes are falling apart. I would strongly recommend not doing any kind of business with this company.

name: Ronnie Shepherd
text: These people hardly ever answer the phone during business hours.  They do not return calls or respond to emails.  Poorly run company.

name: dave jones
text: Extremely unprofessional and difficult to work with. Poorly organized managers. Often rude on the phone. Avoid.

name: L C
text:
ZERO STARS!! TERRIBLE, TERRIBLE TERRIBLE! IS THERE SUCH A THING AS NEGATIVE STARS?!
Absconded money & full of lies!

name: Donna Bryant
text: Slow to respond and poor customer service

name: susan evans
text: total jerks

name: Brandon Harris
text: Terrible company ran by terrible people.

name: Bocephus (Nate Dawg)
text: Best reality company in town hands down y’all give them props ! They use McDaniel electric for electrical which is even better !

resp.text: Thanks Nathan, We appreciate you guys too. Our Property Management Team loves the work you do!!!

name: Terri Dover
text: We own a rental that they have managed for a long time.  The property is inspected and taken care of and we have been pleased with the service.  Recently Carolina was added to the team and she has really bumped the service up a notch.  I really love working with her, she is responsive to any needs we may have and does an excellent job of staying in contact with us if there are any issues.  She has always been friendly and helpful over the phone and it has made things easier for us whenever we need her.  She inspects the property and has always let us know the condition after a tenant moves out so we feel assured that things have been taken care of.  I highly recommend this company and especially Carolina she is the best.

name: Johanna Taylor
text: Very unprofessional people. A friend of mine and I are in business together.  My friend leased a building with Moore Property Management. At that time I was a silent partner. They were supposedly the “management company”. However, very ineffective and little management with problems. Cody told LIES from the beginning and made promises...never following through. Elizabeth was the property manager...Terrible manager! She tried to manage the property from her desk only; not ever wanting to leave the office to address issues in person. When the lease was up my friend chose not to renew and that’s when they really became nasty. Jon became angry when he reached out to my friend and she decline renewing, he actually hung the phone up in her face...very rude and such a cowardly act. We actually are buying our new location. We are so happy to be done with these damn idiots.

resp.text:
Dear Johanna,
Thank you for your feedback.  We are sorry that you had a bad experience. We're known for our exceptional customer service and regret we missed the mark with you and your friend.  Our company strives to achieve exceptional results for our clients. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to talk with you further, please contact Jeff our President directly at 334-356-8579.

name: Michael R. White
text: They are pleasant to deal with if you are interested in commercial property.

name: Admiral Movers
text: Dependable people, smart folks, experienced partners. I have used them on Commercial Deals.

name: Scott Whitt
text:
Slum lords in my experience with them.
They send sub par Contractors out to repair rental properties and they do terrible work.
Then harass the renter for making them repair things.

resp.text: Scott, we don't show where you are a tenant at our properties, your review must be for some other property or company as we send licensed and insured contractors out to do the work when it needs done.  Sorry you had this experience with some other company.  We would appreciate you putting the review on the correct company.  Thank you in advance.

name: Grant Rivera
text: The only reason there aren't more bad reviews is because Golden Rule Real Estate Team makes owners sign a contract that they can't leave any bad reviews. I'm guessing the good reviews are friends of Scott. Some of the things you could look forward to when using Golden Rule Real Estate Team would be lack of recording who gave a deposit, who paid rent, how much everyone paid, they expect you to pay money for mistakes they make and for services you don't want or need, they act like you work for them instead of the opposite. They are supposed to be there help work for the owner and make your job easier but it will be much worse with their help. Do yourself a favor and find someone else or manage the property yourself.

resp.text: Hi Grant, Sorry I don't see where we have ever managed any of your properties.  We give owner reports that include every single payment and expense and how much they paid on a monthly basis on the 15th of each month.  Sorry you had that experience with whatever property management company you were using, it wasn't Golden Rule Real Estate team.

name: Laura Carrillo
text: Excellent workers very good work! They have done a great job taking care of us! Great service and environment! Especially the lady in the office very sweet, friendly and kinda! I would really recommend people here, they are fairly quick to response to issues!

resp.text: Thank you Laura

name: Gary Riddle
text: Living on a Golden Rule Real Estate has been pleasant. The management team has always been dependable. There is always something they are working on. Lately, there has been small changes made to beautify the property and bring pride to the community. It is a calm place to live, as tenants whose lifestyle interrupts the neighborhood are dealt with in a peaceful manner.

resp.text: Thank you Gary,  we appreciate the feedback and support.

name: SamInYkiki
text: Scott and his team provide real value.  I came to Scott with my properties that were mismanaged and not performing good, or even close.  Scott took on my quad-plexes and had them turned around within three months, and had them producing more revenue, than they had in couple years.  I was a remote owner, and his team is responsive and professional, and really gave me peace of mind.

resp.text: Thanks Sam, I appreciate it, it was a pleasure to work with you and I am glad it worked for both of us.

name: Logan Barkley
text: Golden Rule Real Estate has been absolutely wonderful to work with. Very professional and always dependable. As far as HVAC goes each property has very well maintained central units. If there is a repair or replacement needed Golden Rule treats that as the top priority.

resp.text: Thanks Logan, we appreciate good quality, fair priced vendors like you.  We highly recommend Barkley Heating and Air Conditioning.

name: Elizabeth Sanchez
text: Great customer service super helpful and the best thing is that they are fully bilingual in English and Spanish!!

resp.text: Thanks Elizabeth

name: Miguel Reyes
text: Good workers ,good management company. They take care of tenants very well.

resp.text: Thank you Miguel

name: Samantha Carrillo
text: Great costumer service great attitude really responsive loved it!

resp.text: Thank you Samantha

name: Eva Romero
text: Awesome customer service.

resp.text: Thank you Eva Romero

name: Jason Summer
text: On April 18, 2019, there was a sever storm which blew down a tree at Forest Park Apartments, which Golden Rule manages.  The tree completely blocked the main drive to the back half of the complex, leaving many residents unable to leave or enter the area.  I discovered the downed tree around 8pm that night and immediately contacted the management.  The storm was still going on at the time and it was late at night, so there wasn't much to be done.  But they responded quickly to my email, conversed with me via email in real time, and advised they would take care of it as quickly as possible.  By the time I returned from work the next day, the tree was completely removed -- not just set to the side, but gone.  Nice job, guys!  And thank you again!

resp.text: Thank you Jason, that was very kind of you ... we try our best.

name: Frances Thornton
text: Scott Gray and the Golden Rule Management Team has been a tremendous blessing to me. Words cannot express my gratitude and thanks for how this team has literally blessed my family. The patients, the professionalism, and the compassion of Scott and Jenny Gray is truly refreshing. Thank you Golden Rule! I would recommend this Property Management Team to my family, friends, and loved ones.

resp.text: Hi Frances, thanks for the very kind review, it was a pleasure to be your property management company.

name: Wanita Taylor
text: Really great team i been dealing with them since I moved to Alabama and as long as I live here i will be only dealing with Golden rule real estate they are the best. I would recommend anyone to rent from them they respond very quickly if something needs to be fixed. Very friendly team.

resp.text: Hi Wanita, thanks for the very kind review, it was a pleasure to be your property management company.

name: Micah Harris
text: Scott and his team do a phenomenal job!  They managed a property for me while I was out of state. I never had any worry even being 7 hours away. Highly recommended

resp.text: Hi Micah, thank you for the very kind review, it was a pleasure to be your property management company, I am glad we were able to increase your property's value and help sell your property at a healthy profit.

name: Tricia Carlisle
text: Such a great management company. They manage all of my properties and will continue to do so. They have fantastic customer service and never fail to respond. They have increased our properties values and our profits. We couldnt be more pleased with Scott and his team!

resp.text: Thank you Tricia

name: Hallie Depcik
text: Golden Rule has done a great job taking care of us during our time on their properties.

resp.text: Thank you Hollie, we appreciate it

name: Lance Kohler
text: There is no one else that I would have manage my investment properties in Huntsville! Golden Rule Real Estate Team does a fantastic job!

resp.text: Thanks Lance, it was kind of you to take the time to review our property management company.

name: araceli velazquez
text: I worked for this company and it was such a pleasure! And an amazing experience working there along with Scott and Elvira .Will def miss it.

resp.text: Very kind of you to say this Araceli, I only wish you were still with us, Godspeed to you in your new adventure.

name: Angela Mills
text: I would highly recommend Golden Rule Real Estate to manage your property. Scott and his team have been great to work with.....always available and very efficient!

resp.text: Thank you Angela

name: Taj Mayfield
text: Scott Gray and his team are exceptional. They are very helpful in whatever you ask of them. My family and I very grateful and appreciative of them!

resp.text: Thank you Taj

name: Ten Ring
text:
Very surprised to see some of the other comments. Our interaction with this group is as a result of our HOA hiring them as a property management at Whitworth farms in Madison Al. We have a terrible HOA but these guys somehow managed to make it worse. Their entire function has been to harass home owners about things like kids basketball goals being beside their homes and bikes being left in the front yards. We (homeowners) made such a stink and contacted Madison police to make sure they stayed out our yards, they backed off.
When I called to try to get access to online account they were very rude, and would not respond. To my knowledge they have done absolutely nothing to help with our safety concerns, speeding traffic through the subdivision or any other concerns that have been raised. I sent them an email apx 1 YEAR ago and have yet to get a response. Absolutely useless!

resp.text: Mr. Ten Ring, we are not sure who you are, and apologize but we cant find where you have left us a message about any issues you have.  We will get you access to your online account right away when we know who you are.  Everyone else has access to their account that wants it and we will gladly get you access also.  If you have anyone speeding in the neighborhood, we will call the Madison Police to see if they will patrol the areas like we do for our other HOA's, it is helpful if you will get the tag number and description of the car.  Regarding the basketball goals, that is unfortunately in the bylaws and there for liability reasons and out of our control.  I wish it were different but we have to enforce all the bylaws, not just the ones we want too.  Hopefully we can help with the other items also.  Please feel free to contact us directly anytime at 256-677-9797 and leave a message if we don't answer and I will personally get back to you right away.

name: Joel Price
text: Golden Rule Real Estate provides an integrated solution to property management.  They remove the pressures and Day to day anxiety that come with management by doing it yourself. I regret not making the move sooner. I highly recommend Scott and his team for your property management needs.

resp.text: Thank you Joel

name: Daniel Burdette
text: Terrible would never rent from them again used alot of slick and sometimes coercive tactics to get what they want do not trust these people

resp.text: We are sorry that you feel that way, Golden Rule did everything we could do to help you, we thought deleting your late fees and not charging you for the bad checks that you and Shaylynn Edwards wrote would make you happy.  And that accepting you as a tenant with two evictions when we don't normally accept Section 8 residents with evictions without a co signor and you were unable to get a co signor.  Now we are left with no options but to turn you over to collections for the debt, damages and cleaning you left behind.  We wish you the best of luck in the future.

name: Eduardo Monroy
text:
(Translated by Google) A good staff in the office, the very friendly lady took her time to show us an apartment and explain the contract to us, thank you
